column4: hi. I have some problems with my screenresolution on my laptop. Xubuntu. Newbie:) Could anyone help please?
ask your question please - all in one line

When I log on ,my screenresulotion is set way too high. the logon and splah is also wrong resolution. Once inside xubuntu I turn the resolution down using the screen options. But the settings wont stick! When I restart it's all wrong again. And I cant turn off or log off. Say's the system Halted. So I have to use the power off button :d
sorry no idea, but you might want to add info about your hardware
